title: Jujube Universe
description: Video exploring jujube as a super seed with cosmic significance
detail: This work is an expansion of the view of the jujube. I thought that the structure of the jujube's supergene is like a galaxy in the universe and gave it a new personality, which I linked to a meteorite that fell to earth.
technical_detail: In this artwork, the jujube serves as a prominent motif that will greatly influence the future of humanity, symbolizing a fervent desire to extensively study jujubes as one of the Super Seeds that could potentially save humanity.
